bug.author: benchislett
bug.summary: API Documentation - Incorrect formatting for tanh activation function
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/activations/tanh>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/activations/tanh</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
The arguments section of the tanh activation documentation is not formatted correctly. I am uncertain as to why, but suspect it may be due to a lack of a newline after the example block (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r2.0/tensorflow/python/keras/activations.py#L201-L221>code here</denchmark-link> )

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/benchislett>@benchislett</denchmark-link> , thanks for reporting, but the issue has actually already been fixed in the branch <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/keras/activations.py#L225-L243>here</denchmark-link> .
Great! Thanks for letting me know.
